constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 188 (Tuesday, October 26, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. NEWHOUSE:
H.R. 5740.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article IV, Section 3, clause 2 provides Congress with the
power to ``dispose of and make all needful Rules and
Regulations respecting the Territory and other Property
belonging to the United States.''
[Page H5932]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Water, Oceans, and Wildlife.

title: To codify certain regulations relating to endangered species and threatened species listing and critical habitat designation.
